metadata.title: CVE-2017-7561 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Red Hat JBoss EAP version 3.0.7 through before 4.0.0.Beta1 is vulnerable to a server-side cache poisoning or CORS requests in the JAX-RS component resulting in a moderate impact.

criterions.comment: resteasy package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.2-1').
resteasy3.0 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.26-1').
